title: Usage of deprecated features
body:
Clang warns about using deprecated C++ features with the "-Wdeprecated" warning.

E.g. usage of dynamic exception specifications:

``` shell
/Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/internal/catch_notimplemented_exception.h:21:44: warning: 
      dynamic exception specifications are deprecated [-Wdeprecated]
        virtual ~NotImplementedException() throw() {}
                                           ^~~~~~~
/Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/internal/catch_notimplemented_exception.h:21:44: note: use
      'noexcept' instead
        virtual ~NotImplementedException() throw() {}
                                           ^~~~~~~
                                           noexcept
/Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/internal/catch_notimplemented_exception.h:23:42: warning: 
      dynamic exception specifications are deprecated [-Wdeprecated]
        virtual const char* what() const throw();
                                         ^~~~~~~
/Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/internal/catch_notimplemented_exception.h:23:42: note: use
      'noexcept' instead
        virtual const char* what() const throw();
                                         ^~~~~~~
                                         noexcept
```

Or defining assignment operator without copy constructor (in C++>=11 the copy constructor is not implicitly generated anymore):

``` shell
In file included from /Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/test/all_test.cpp:2:
In file included from /Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/catch.hpp:34:
In file included from /Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/internal/catch_capture.hpp:11:
In file included from /Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/internal/catch_expression_decomposer.hpp:11:
/Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/internal/catch_expression_lhs.hpp:21:10: warning: 
      definition of implicit copy constructor for 'ExpressionLhs<bool>' is deprecated because it has a user-declared copy assignment operator
      [-Wdeprecated]
    void operator = ( ExpressionLhs const& );
         ^
/Users/gnzlbg/projects/sideprojects/arithmetic_type/ext/catch/catch-prefix/src/catch/include/internal/catch_expression_decomposer.hpp:25:16: note: 
      implicit copy constructor for 'ExpressionLhs<bool>' first required here
        return ExpressionLhs<bool>( value );
```
